title: Nina Draws Scientists
description:
When science student Nina Chhita moved to London, she started to explore the city by drawing likenesses of its famous inhabitants. Many of them scientists. And many of those scientists were women. But when a Christmas trivia night at a local pub made it clear she was the only one who knew who they were -- it sparked an idea. One that could help change what we know about scientists.

See Nina’s artwork on Instagram and Twitter
